text: chaur anak( mou ham meat) pol tha khnhom kmean lotthopheap karpar khluon khnhom pi krohthnak namuoy laey haey khnhom ka min ach neaphl brayoch namuoy samreab khluon khnhom der leuklengte avei del a l laoh mean chetnea bonnaoh . krob brachacheate sotthote mean pelkamnt . now pel del karkamnt robsa puokke ban mokadl puokke min ach som ponyearpel ryy som aoy kaetlaeng mounpelkamnt ban laey saumbite muoy vineati kadaoy
